attributes.action: Remove the X Factor from our tv screens as I for one have had enough of it.
attributes.additional_details: I would like The X Factor tv show to be removed from our screens. I don't like talking about it, seeing it on my facebook or taking up hours of television space. So that other more deserving shows might get a chance. It gives people false hope of a singing career when they cannot sing and has got to stop. The only winner is Simon Cowell and even he doesn't want to be on it anymore. Bring back 3-2-1, or the Price is Right. Something! Anything even YouBet, I liked that. Not this rubbish please do what you need to do. You know it makes sense.

rejection.details: Responsibility for what is broadcast on television and radio rests with the broadcasters and the organisations which regulate broadcasting - the Office of Communications (OFCOM), the BBC Trust and the Welsh Fourth Channel Authority (S4C). They are independent of the Government.
